<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Append agent role for the UI property 'Roles that can view email in the Activity formatter when including Sent/Received Emails'</description>
        <name>Append HR to Email Activity UI Property</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var HR_ROLE = 'sn_hr_core.case_writer';

var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_properties");
gr.addQuery('name', 'glide.ui.activity.email_roles');
gr.addQuery('value', 'NOT LIKE', HR_ROLE);
gr.query();

if (gr.next()) {
	gr.setValue('value', gr.getValue('value') + ',' + HR_ROLE);
	gr.update();
}]]></script>
